title: I Left My Brains in San Francisco
description: Zombie problem? Call Neeta Lyffe, Zombie Exterminator-but not this weekend. On vacation at an exterminator's convention, she's looking to relax, have fun, and enjoy a little romance. Too bad the zombies have a different idea. When they rise from their watery graves to take over the City by the Bay, it looks like it'll be a working vacation after all. Enjoy the thrill of re-kill with Neeta Lyffe, Zombie Exterminator.
author: Karina Lumbert Fabian
